demand_function module¶

class demand_function.DemandFunction¶

Bases: object

The demand function is a map of the price of a product to its sales.

The demand function must give the quantity of the product that will be sold by any agent in the market at a given price.

abstract get_sales(current_prices: list[float]) → list[int]¶

Calculates the quantity of the product that will be sold at a given price for each agent.

Parameters

current_prices (list[float]) – The current price of the product set by all agents.

Returns

The quantity of item sold by each agent, indexed by where their price appeared in current_prices argument.

Return type

list[int]

Raises

NotImplementedError – If concrete class does not override method.

simulation
